feed.title: Stirling PDF Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.24.4 Fix issue with settings.yml and icons
entry.content:
Bug fixes for settings.yml being reset Bug fix for book icons not displaying correctly

(For people that follow every update sorry for the spam)

What's Changed

  • Config fixes by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1253

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.24.3...v0.24.4

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.24.5 reverse proxy fix and czech added
entry.content:
Czech language added Reverse proxy fix for non security mode User Friendly Merge File Selection (needs a translation but reverse proxy release is more urgent)

What's Changed

  • Add missing Turkish translation by @limonkufu in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1255
  • Czech translations by @Houba28 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1263
  • Amended typo: trailing space by @zallaevan in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1256
  • User Friendly Merge File Selection by @t71rs in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1204
  • Updated ReadMe Screenshot by @t71rs in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1272
  • Add in oauth scope environment variable to docker-compose example by @pcanham in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1265
  • cleanup html for reverse proxy by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1274
  • :floppy_disk: Update Version by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1275

New Contributors

  • @limonkufu made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1255
  • @Houba28 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1263
  • @zallaevan made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1256
  • @pcanham made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1265

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.24.4...v0.24.5

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.24.6 Alpine docker update
entry.content:
Hoping slower updates going forwards with extra features :)

Docker update to update alpine for security issues etc Reversion of Merge files fix to avoid file selection issues in other prompts

What's Changed

  • Revert "User Friendly Merge File Selection" by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1280
  • update alpine to v3.20.0 by @Zoey2936 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1276

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.24.5...v0.24.6

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.25.0 PDF.js update, HTTP2 support
entry.content:
Enhancements

  • Various OAuth2 changes (Thanks @Ludy87 )
  • Various translations, Thanks all as always
  • Home page UI tweaks (flatter boxes) (thanks 'dev-cb' in cloudron forum) Will need another cache clear
  • PDF.js updated from 3.11 to 4.3 for security and feature changes (Thanks @Ludy87 again )
  • Backend server type changed from Tomcat to Jetty, Way faster loading, but 10% more ram... let me know if this is a good change (Also means HTTP2.0 support and some other nice features) This might cause some weird servers issues.. something to keep eye on
  • Gradle version updated to 8.7

Bugs

  • Bug causing certain tmp files to remain longer than expected

What's Changed

  • :floppy_disk: Update Version by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1281
  • add multi OAuth2 Provider by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1284
  • fix fr translation of "Sign" by @miniupnp in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1283
  • Fix: remove dublicate en_GB, missing translation German by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1285
  • :memo: Update README: Translation Progress Table by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1286
  • add: multi OAuth2 option README.md, small cosmetic repairs by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1287
  • Update messages_it_IT.properties by @albanobattistella in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1295
  • chore: add some Chinese text translation by @wai4y in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1293
  • :memo: Update README: Translation Progress Table by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1296
  • Cucumber testcases by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1297
  • update gradle wrapper version by @wahab95 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1292
  • Fix fr messages by @miniupnp in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1303
  • fix: change "crop image" to "crop pdf" by @sbplat in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1302
  • Bump PDF.js from 3.11.174 to 4.3.118 by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1300
  • :memo: Update README: Translation Progress Table by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1304
  • Tomcat to Jetty and other changes by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1307
  • fix fr messages: fix a typo "Redimensionner" by @miniupnp in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1305
  • Update 3rd Party Licenses by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1308
  • gha by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1309
  • add invalid Id Token message by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1311
  • :memo: Update README: Translation Progress Table by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1317
  • UI changes credit 'dev-cb' in cloudron forum by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1318
  • :floppy_disk: Update Version by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1319

New Contributors

  • @miniupnp made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1283
  • @wai4y made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1293
  • @wahab95 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1292

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.24.6...v0.25.0

entry.title: New release for Stirling PDF: 0.25.2 Lots of bug fixes! Norwegian and Oauth changes
entry.content:
Enhancements

  • Norwegian translation by @arsvendg
  • OAuth changes to not require hardcoded values (https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1390 for more info Thanks @Ludy87 )

Bug fixes

  • Fix for Flattern not working correctly
  • disabled settings.yml updating while we resolve it resetting configs....
  • custom path like /pdf now works correctly for admin page
  • customHTML error resolved
  • markdown to pdf fix

What's Changed

  • Sonar by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1362
  • Norwegian translation by @arsvendg in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1373
  • Small adjustmens to language file by @arsvendg in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1376
  • tweaks and fix for #1381 by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1382
  • Minor corrections in the languages by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1389
  • Enhance OAuth2 Client Registration with Dynamic Provider Details by @Ludy87 in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1390
  • remove settings files update for now by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1388
  • :floppy_disk: Update Version by @github-actions in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1391
  • resolve admin config with custom path by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1393
  • Resolve customHTML error by @Frooodle in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1394

New Contributors

  • @arsvendg made their first contribution in https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/pull/1373

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Stirling-Tools/Stirling-PDF/compare/v0.25.1...v0.25.2
